title: Bug 23935 Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.
OB: When running the code with build 20020920, the text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus on Windows.
EB: When running the code with build 20020920, the left tree and text should behave as they do on Windows and Linux.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Compile and run the attached code with build 20020920.
2. Observe the behavior of the text widget with Tree parent on Windows.
